system.effect: Prerequisites: Rainbow Light, Expert Occult Education Ingredients: Two Shards of each Color. Effect: You create a Rainbow Gem that may crafted to be worn as your choice of an Accessory Item, Head Slot Item, or Hand or Off-Hand Item. This item has the same effect as a Focus, except that as an Extended Action, any Trainer with Expert Occult Education Rank or higher may change which Stat the Rainbow Amulet is attuned to.
